      • shards

        protected GroupShardsIterator shards​(ClusterState clusterState,
                                     ValidateQueryRequest request,
                                     java.lang.String[] concreteIndices)
        从类复制的说明: TransportBroadcastAction
        Determines the shards this operation will be executed on. The operation is executed once per shard iterator, typically on the first shard in it. If the operation fails, it will be retried on the next shard in the iterator.
        指定者:
        shards 在类中 TransportBroadcastAction<ValidateQueryRequest,​ValidateQueryResponse,​ShardValidateQueryRequest,​org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.validate.query.ShardValidateQueryResponse>
